rules_text:
Deathtouch
{2}{G}: Transform Adderblade Exterminator. Activate only if it's attacking.
flavor_text:
[i]“This isn't even the most brutal method
in my repertoire.”[/i]
rules_text2:
Deathtouch
Whenever Addermark Eviscerator deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if Addermark Eviscerator didn't attack this turn, transform it.
